meanings.definition: A jeweled crown or headband worn as a symbol of sovereignty.
meanings.sent1: The princess wore a sparkling tiara on her head.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a queen when she placed the tiara on her head.
meanings.sent3: The tiara shimmered under the palace lights, making her feel regal.
meanings.sent4: Her tiara was a symbol of her royal status, shining brightly for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The tiara sparkled like a thousand stars, crowning her with elegance.

meanings.definition: A high, ornamental headdress worn by women.
meanings.sent1: The tiara added a touch of glamour to her outfit.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the tiara on her head before the ball.
meanings.sent3: Her tiara was so tall, she had to watch out for door frames!
meanings.sent4: The tiara perched on her head like a majestic bird, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The tiara gleamed above her, making her feel like a princess in a fairy tale.
